DOC.brief_summary: An open-label, non-comparative, multi-centre, phase II prospective trial to assess the efficacy of Quetiapine fumarate augmentation of selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) in SSRI-resistant major depressive disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of SEROQUEL in Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors (SSRI)-Resistant Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inform consent Male and female, age between 18 and 65 years. Na√Øve to any atypical antipsychotic A diagnosis of major depressive disorder No use of fluvoxamine Patients with a history of bipolar I or II disorder Diagnosis of psychotic major depression disorder
